    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [static]                                1         7
    [char]                                  8         12
    [char_array]                            13        23
    [\[]                                    23        24
    [137]                                   24        27
    [\]]                                    27        28
L10
    [;]                                     2         3
L12
    [static]                                1         7
    [struct]                                8         14
    [struct_foo]                            15        25
    [my_struct]                             26        35
L13
    [;]                                     67        68
L16
    [static]                                1         7
    [const]                                 8         13
    [short]                                 14        19
    [foo]                                   20        23
    [=]                                     24        25
    [BAR]                                   26        29
    [;]                                     29        30
EOF
